sentences.en: A mother who is cruel to her child is unnatural.
sentences.cn: 母亲对孩子残忍是不近人情的.

sentences.en: Children can be so cruel.
sentences.cn: 孩子有时可能会相当残忍。

sentences.en: cruel jokes about mothers-in-law
sentences.cn: 有关岳母的刻薄笑话

sentences.en: He is still the butt of cruel jokes about his humble origins.
sentences.cn: 他仍然因出身低微而被人无情嘲笑。

sentences.en: He said something to me so mean, so needlessly cruel.
sentences.cn: 他对我说了一些十分刻薄、太过冷酷的话。

sentences.en: He thinks it cruel to confine a lark in a cage.
sentences.cn: 他认为把云雀关在笼子里太残忍了.

sentences.en: He was self-centred, but he wasn't cruel.
sentences.cn: 他很自私，但是并非无情。

sentences.en: He would be incapable of committing such a cruel deed.
sentences.cn: 他不会做出这么残忍的事.

sentences.en: Her eyes were cruel and hard.
sentences.cn: 她目光冷酷。

sentences.en: His death was a cruel blow .
sentences.cn: 他的死是个无情的打击。

sentences.en: I can't stand people who are cruel to animals.
sentences.cn: 我无法容忍虐待动物的人。

sentences.en: It is cruel to keep animals in confined spaces.
sentences.cn: 把动物关在狭小的空间里是残酷的。

sentences.en: It was a cruel tactless thing to say.
sentences.cn: 这话说得刻毒了，很不得体。

sentences.en: It's cruel to use a whip to punish a child.
sentences.cn: 用鞭子惩罚孩子是残酷的.

sentences.en: Sometimes life seems unbearably cruel.
sentences.cn: 有时候生活残酷得让人无法承受。

sentences.en: The detainees are often held in cruel and inhuman conditions.
sentences.cn: 被拘留者的关押环境常常恶劣严酷、很不人道。

sentences.en: The former manager of the company repined against his cruel fate.
sentences.cn: 公司前经理怨叹命运对他太残酷.

sentences.en: The prisoner was a hard cruel man.
sentences.cn: 这个囚犯残酷无情。

sentences.en: The wind was not as sharp and cruel as it had been.
sentences.cn: 风不像刚才那么凛冽和凶猛了。

sentences.en: These cruel devices are designed to stop prisoners bending their legs.
sentences.cn: 这些残酷的刑具是用来阻止犯人弯腿的。

sentences.en: To modern eyes, such doctrines appear harsh, even cruel.
sentences.cn: 从现代的角度看, 这样的教义显得苛刻, 甚至残酷.

words.tran_cn: 残酷；残忍；刻毒伤人的语言

phrases.tran_cn: （最终使其受益的）严格对待某人

trans.tran_en: making someone suffer or feel unhappy
